title: Resource shortage
description: Key developers may be pulled to other projects
mitigation: Cross-train team members, establish resource buffer

title: Scope creep
mitigation: Strict change control process, regular scope reviews

title: Budget overrun
description: Current spend rate exceeds planned budget
mitigation: Immediate cost review, scope reduction, stakeholder escalation

title: Technical debt
mitigation: Allocate sprint for refactoring, bring in technical consultant

title: Timeline delay
description: Project likely to miss Q3 deadline
mitigation: Fast-track critical path, add resources, negotiate deadline extension

title: Integration complexity
description: API integration with legacy systems proving difficult
mitigation: Develop adapter layer, engage legacy team early
